name: VR Crazy Kids Car Driving Free
name_original: VR Crazy Kids Car Driving Free
description:
Crazy kid car driving is a free vr car racing game for simulation lovers. Drive your 3d cardboard car from a variety of cars and hit all obstacles located in a grand city with a real effects of virtual reality. While hitting other obstacles your car health can be affected. So don't forget to pick a car health placed in multiple locations of a 3d city. Obstacles can be a lots of motor bike, poles and other goods which kept in city street and your mission is to ruined all these objects with your crazy vr car driving. Crazy ki car driving gives you a loads of modes to play with a navigation of virtual reality. Select from a free 3d mode and a vr checkpoint mode. In free 3d mode you only have to hit and crush the objects with your crazy car while in vr checkpoint mode game doesn't end with hitting but you have to collect checkpoints as well to complete a challenge and a regarding goal of crazy kid car driving. So download crazy kid car driving today and enjoy a real crazy drive with vr cardboard.
Features:
Loads of crazy cars to play. Varaity of 3d playing modes. Multiple targets locates in city for hitting. Loads of checkpoints to collect. A free game for crazy driving lovers. Smooth control and highly tuned physics. Excellent graphics and features. Stirring sound effects.
